page.title: 09PARKS
page.content: In 1983 it was proposed that a theme park be built on{Bodafon Fields}- the fields that provide the grazing for the farm already mentioned. This park would involve the complete takeover of the farm and the end of its three hundred and fifty years history.The original plan saw the park as a {tourist centre}with the theme of{Alice {in Wonderland }because of the Liddell family connection with Llandudno.To meet the estimated building costs (Â£53M) the park would need to attract {8 million visitors a year }with an entrance charge of{Â£5 per head.}There have been mixed reactions from residents and regular visitors to Llandudno creating a great deal of correspondence in the local press.
